articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077's next major update is due in early 2022 - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: CD Projekt Red have confirmed that the next "major update" for Cyberpunk 2077 will launch alongside the next-gen console update, in 2022 by the end of March.
articles.content: As CD Projekt Red continue to fix up their fancy-but-oh-so-flawed futuristic RPG Cyberpunk 2077, they've confirmed that we should expect a "major update" next year, by the end of March. CDPR had prev… [+2041 chars]
